name: Scope pseudo-class
description: This pseudo-class is called **scope pseudo-class** and represents any element that is in the contextual reference element set. If the contextual reference element set is empty, `:scope` is equivalent to `:root`.
example_description: In this example the `:scope` is equivalent to `:root` and will select the `<html>` element. The scoped style will be applied to its parent element (as reference) too.
